pullrequest.title: Added more coordinate frame transforms to the SphericalCoordinates class.

content.raw: Its very likely that I implemented something wrong. The reason that I declined the pull request was because I saw that gazebo already depends on GDAL for terrain. I was thinking that I might rather use the [SpatialReference](http://www.gdal.org/osr_tutorial.html) API in GDAL to do the transforms in a more robust manner.
content.html: Its very likely that I implemented something wrong. The reason that I declined the pull request was because I saw that gazebo already depends on GDAL for terrain. I was thinking that I might rather use the SpatialReference API in GDAL to do the transforms in a more robust manner.
